other_tests.findings: The appendix is dilated, measuring up to 9.8 mm, with surrounding fat inflammation without evidence for perforation or fluid collection. The kidneys are enlarged and contain numerous cystic and fat-containing lesions. A non-obstructing 5.8 mm stone is present in the lower pole of the left kidney. Multiple thin-walled cysts are noted in the lungs, and there is a pleural-based nodular opacity in the right lower lung.
